result.eng: They were trying not to hurt the animal in the head.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag iarraidh gan an t-ainmhí a ghoin sa cheann
result.orig: Bhí siad ag iarraidh gan an t-ainmhí a ghoin sa cheann
result.html: Bhí siad ag iarraidh gan an t-ainmhí a ghoin sa cheannThey were trying not to hurt the animal in the head.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag iarraiḋ gan an t-ainṁí a ġoin sa ċeannThey were trying not to hurt the animal in the head.

result.ga: Ghoin an masla go smior é
result.orig: Ghoin an masla go smior é
result.html: Ghoin an masla go smior éThe insult hurt him deeply.
result.ponchtml: Ġoin an masla go smior éThe insult hurt him deeply.

result.eng: It hurt me that my mother should be begging.
result.ga: Ghoin sé mé go mbeadh mo mháthair ag lorg déirce
result.orig: Ghoin sé mé go mbeadh mo mháthair ag lorg déirce
result.html: Ghoin sé mé go mbeadh mo mháthair ag lorg déirceIt hurt me that my mother should be begging.
result.ponchtml: Ġoin sé mé go mbeaḋ mo ṁáṫair ag lorg déirceIt hurt me that my mother should be begging.

result.eng: No doubt, the hardship hurt the islanders.
result.ga: Ghoin an cruatan na hoileánaigh gan dabht
result.orig: Ghoin an cruatan na hoileánaigh gan dabht
result.html: Ghoin an cruatan na hoileánaigh gan dabhtNo doubt, the hardship hurt the islanders.
result.ponchtml: Ġoin an cruatan na hoileánaiġ gan daḃtNo doubt, the hardship hurt the islanders.
